info.author: toddy
info.details:
Hold the wiimotes sideways or use a classic controller 

Wiimote keys are:
1 - rotate anticlockwise / back in menu screens
2 - rotate clockwise / select in menu screens
down - soft drop
A, up* - hard drop
+ - toggle ghost 
home - pause

Classic controller keys are:
B - rotate anticlockwise / back in menu screens
A - rotate clockwise / select in menu screens
down - soft drop
L, R, ZL, ZR, up* - hard drop
X - toggle ghost 
home, -, + - pause
